/** * This class performs namespace binding on the startElement and endElement * method calls in accordance with Namespaces in XML 1.1. It extends the standard, * Namespace-1.0-compliant binder in order to do this. * * @xerces.internal * * @author Neil Graham, IBM * * @version $Id: XML11NamespaceBinder.java,v 1.5 2004/10/04 21:45:49 mrglavas Exp $ */
